Common.FloorPlans.Common.ImageCaption: Majestic International Trade Port - Phase 1 Site Plan
Majestic International Trade Port - Overall Site Plan

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text:
• Adjacent to the Pharr International Trade Bridge
• The only international bridge with north and south bound commercial traffic in the area.
• The only commercial international bridge with Free and Secure Trade land program in the region; commercial clearance program for known low-risk shipments entering the United States from Canada and Mexico.
• Frontage on only truck exit road from Border Safety Inspection Facility (BSIF) into the U.S.; safety and weight compliance inspection facility of commercial vehicles prior to their entering the highway system in the United. States.
• Direct access to Overweight Corridor, as well as the future State Highway 365 Toll Road.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Majestic International Trade Port is a master-planned industrial park sitting at the focal point of international trade in Pharr, Texas. Situated at the intersection of Military Highway and San Juan Road, Phase 1 of Majestic International Trade Port will have frontage access to the future State Highway 365 Toll Road and sit along the future truck route from the Border Safety Inspection Facility at the Pharr International Trade Bridge; the only international bridge with north and southbound commercial traffic in the area. Majestic International Trade Port will accommodate industrial distribution and manufacturing class A facilities of 100,000 square feet up to in excess of one million square feet. Less than five miles south, Majestic International Trade Port will have direct access to Reynosa, Tamaulipas, Mexico, home to over four hundred manufacturing operations occupying over thirty million square feet of industrial real estate. Northbound, this development will feed into Highway 281/Cage Boulevard, transitioning into Interstate 69, one of the most efficient distribution corridors in the U.S.

Common.Brochures.Common.BrochureName: Pharr Bridge Business Park (900 W. Zaragoza Drive) Brochure.pdf

Common.FloorPlans.Common.ImageCaption: Pharr Bridge Business Park (900 Zaragoza Drive) - Site & Floor Plan

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: Docks: Up to 32 dock high, 2 concrete ramps
Security: Fenced and secured truck courts with controlled truck entrances

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Pharr Bridge Business Park (PBBP) is a 60 acre master planned industrial park with over 200,000 square feet of completed Class A facilities, 110,000 square feet under construction and over 135,000 square feet of future construction. This premiere development is located along the overweight corridor and less than 1.5 miles from the Pharr International Trade Bridge; the only international bridge with north and southbound commercial traffic in the area.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: This development offers flexible multi-tenant and build-to-suit layouts with on-site trailer staging for distribution, warehousing, and light assembly users. With an emphasis on efficient inventory management, PBBP delivers an ease of C-TPAT compliance through fenced and secured truck courts for its clients.
